message: I always run into dependency problems with mxDatetime and a virtualenv on Ubuntu. Since I can't find a lot of information about it I was wondering if it's only me?
I asked the same question on stackoverflow but it got closed because it was a duplicate. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5847499/virtualenv-psycopg2-and-mxdatetime
In the end I want to just use django with postgres.
ah victory! Manually installed egenix-mx-base into my virtualenv and that did the trick.
